settings.heading: About Hyper
settings.abount_content:
HYPER only makes groundbreaking Apple & mobile accessories

From HyperDrive® (Most Crowdfunded USB-C Accessory) to HyperJuice® (World's first MacBook battery pack), to iUSBport® (World's first wireless USB port) and iStick® (World's first flash drive for the iPhone), HYPER has been going over and beyond, making products that exceed expectations and inspire the industry. Often imitated but never duplicated, you will not find ordinary here.

Only HYPER® - Creators of HyperDrive®, HyperJuice®, HyperVR™, HyperThin®, HyperShield® and more.
